critique: The executive order seems to be a legal document that withdraws land from settlement. It is unlikely to evoke strong emotions. The primary goal is to inform the public about the land withdrawal. Therefore, the scores for all emotions should be low. I will set joy, sadness, anger, fear, disgust, and surprise all to 1 initially. After further consideration, I don't think any emotion is intended to be conveyed, so I will revise all scores to 1.
